about.description: A Frontend Developer with over 5 years of experience in building scalable and high-performance web applications, with 3+ years of experience in ReactJS, JavaScript (ES6) and TypeScript. My background includes designing, developing, and implementing technological solutions, with a focus on API integration, UI optimization, and process automation. I have led key initiatives in dynamic environments, collaborating with cross-functional teams and ensuring the delivery of efficient and scalable products. My objective is to apply my expertise and my focus on problem-solving, resilience, and continuous improvement to innovate and create impactful digital experiences, taking on new challenges that add value through code.
about.title: Frontend Developer

welcome.description: I'm a frontend developer with experience in React and TypeScript.
welcome.title: LET ME INTRODUCE MYSELF! MY NAME IS JUAN DAVID PALADINES AMAYA.
